rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2094}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS2095, ATS2097, ATS2099, ATS3097, ATS3099, GRN1050, GRN1070, GRN1090, GRN2050, GRN2070, GRN2090, GRN3070, GRN3090, GRN3315}

description: A communicative course designed to further speaking and reading skills in German. The emphasis is on learning to use German correctly in discussing a variety of topics. Component 2 will focus on the highly productive artistic and intellectual developments in modern German and Austrian culture.
